parameters.name: family
parameters.description: The name of family which is a description of the error distribution to be used in the model. Supported options: binomial, gamma, gaussian, poisson, tweedie.

parameters.name: fitIntercept
parameters.description: whether to fit an intercept term

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: The name of link function which provides the relationship between the linear predictor and the mean of the distribution function. Supported options: cloglog, probit, logit, inverse, sqrt, identity, log

parameters.name: linkPower
parameters.description: The index in the power link function. Only applicable to the Tweedie family.

parameters.name: solver
parameters.description: the solver algorithm for optimization. If this is not set or empty, default value is 'auto'

parameters.name: tol
parameters.description: the convergence tolerance for iterative algorithms (>= 0)

parameters.name: variancePower
parameters.description: The power in the variance function of the Tweedie distribution which characterizes the relationship between the variance and mean of the distribution. Only applicable to the Tweedie family. Supported values: 0 and [1, Inf).

parameters.name: weightCol
parameters.description: weight column name. If this is not set or empty, we treat all instance weights as 1.0
